snippet: Pandora Media reported $120 million in third-quarter revenue, up 60 percent, but said it expected a fourth-quarter loss. Its stock dropped 18 percent after hours.
abstract: Pandora Media reported $120 million in third-quarter revenue, up 60 percent, but said it expected a fourth-quarter loss. Its stock dropped 18 percent after hours.

headline.main: After a Quarterly Gain, Pandora Warns of a Loss to Come
headline.print_headline: After a Quarterly Gain, Pandora Warns of a Loss to Come
